English.alert.about:
WatchCuts lets you trigger the running of shortcuts on your iPhone and iPad from all of your connected iCloud devices.

Pair WatchCuts with Cronios — the shortcuts scheduler for iOS — and have your shortcuts run automatically when you complete tasks on your iPhone, iPad, Mac, or Apple Watch!
English.alert.cronJob.frequency.title: WatchCuts Cron Job Frequency
English.alert.doc.localization:
Displaying English documentation, as WatchCuts help is not yet available in {{language}}.

If you want to help translate WatchCuts, please visit: {{localization url}}.
English.alert.docs.simple:
WatchCuts Help

⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️

1. Create a Reminders list called `{{list}}` and a calendar called `WatchCuts`.

2. Add shortcuts in WatchCuts.

3. Run Cronios in the background (make sure the WatchCuts cron job has been added to Cronios).

4. Check off reminders in `{{list}}` using your iOS device, Mac, or Apple Watch.

5. Watch your shortcuts run automatically.

6. Check the `WatchCuts` calendar for responses from your shortcuts.
English.alert.donate.thankyou.title: Thank You!
English.alert.donate.thankyou: Your support for WatchCuts and independent developers is appreciated!
English.alert.erase.remindersAndEvents: You may be prompted to delete WatchCuts reminders and events from the `{{list}}` Reminders list and the `{{calendar}}` calendar.
English.alert.import.cronJob:
Tap OK to import into Cronios.

If Import Active Status is enabled in Cronios Settings, the cron job will run automatically when you enter `Run Continuously` mode in Cronios. Otherwise edit the cron job and tap Enable.

From the Edit screen, you can also adjust the cron schedule expression better suit the frequency of checks, which is currently set to every {{frequency}} minute(s).
English.alert.responses: WatchCut Responses were added to the `{{calendar}}` calendar.
English.alert.setup.calendar:
To allow shortcuts to send you responses after running via WatchCuts, create a new calendar called `{{calendar}}` in the Calendar app. Tap OK to copy `{{calendar}}` to the clipboard and open Calendar.

Return to Shortcuts when you have created the new calendar.
English.alert.setup.calendar.title: WatchCuts Responses
English.alert.setup.complete:
WatchCuts setup is complete.

Tap OK to read the full WatchCuts documentation and get started automating your shortcuts from all of your connected iCloud devices.
English.alert.setup.complete.title: Learn More About WatchCuts
English.alert.setup.cronios.title: WatchCuts and Cronios
English.alert.setup.cronios: Pair WatchCuts with Cronios — the shortcuts scheduler for iOS — to enable automatic triggering of shortcuts on this device from any iCloud-connected device: iPhone, iPad, Mac, or Apple Watch.
English.alert.setup.reminders:
To use WatchCuts, you must create a Reminders list called `{{list}}` that will store the shortcuts you can run from this iOS device.

Tap OK to copy `{{list}}` to the clipboard and open Reminders.

Return to Shortcuts when you have created the new list.
English.alert.setup.reminders.title: WatchCuts Reminders
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval: This may take a few moments.
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval.title: Retrieving Shortcuts
English.alert.update.none: You are currently running the latest version of WatchCuts.
English.alert.update.none.title: No Update Available
English.error.cache: WatchCuts must reload its menu cache. Please try again after the Home screen appears
English.error.cronios: Cronios is not installed on this iOS device. Download it from http://cronios.com.
English.error.cronios.title: Cronios Not Installed
English.error.offline: You must be connected to the internet for this feature of WatchCuts to work.
English.error.offline.title: No Network Connection
English.label.ok.notAgain: OK and Don't Show This Again
English.menu.main.shortcuts.locked.description: These shortcuts will not run until unlocked.
English.prompt.add: Add shortcuts to WatchCuts. Tap Search and Done to filter your shortcuts list.
English.prompt.cleanUp:
WatchCuts Clean Up

Remove any completed shortcut reminders from the `{{list}}` list and responses from the `{{calendar}}` calendar.

Reminders and Calendars may prompt you to remove these items, perhaps several times if there are many items to delete.
English.prompt.donate: Enjoying WatchCuts? Consider leaving me a tip!
English.prompt.erase.content:
Are you sure you want to delete all WatchCuts content and settings for this device?

This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.erase.content2:
Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to delete all WatchCuts content and settings for this device?

This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.frequency:
Add or Update the WatchCuts Cron Job in Cronios

How often do you want the WatchCuts cron job to run in Cronios? Check times begin from the top of the minute.
English.prompt.main:
WatchCuts

⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️

Run shortcuts from the Reminders list:
{{list}}
English.prompt.main.ipad.long:
WatchCuts

⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️

Pair WatchCuts with Cronios and run shortcuts on your iOS devices (including iPad) from your Apple Watch!

Run shortcuts from the Reminders list: {{list}}

Complete them, and they will automatically run according to WatchCuts' schedule in Cronios.
English.prompt.reminders.delete:
Reminders will now prompt you to remove shortcut reminders that you have:

1. Removed from WatchCuts.

2. Completed in the `{{list}}` list.
English.prompt.remove: Select the shortcuts you wish to remove from WatchCuts.
English.prompt.remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove the selected shortcuts from WatchCuts?
English.prompt.reset: Reset WatchCuts settings or erase all content and settings for WatchCuts?
English.prompt.reset.settings:
Are you sure you want to reset WatchCuts settings on this device?

None of your shortcut reminders  will be affected.
English.prompt.search: Perform a case-sensitive search for shortcuts on this iOS device.
English.prompt.shortcuts.locked: Ensure these shortcuts can run in the background before unlocking.
